answers.answer: Bruiser, there are a couple of things you might want to check out. One is food intolerance issues which can often result in stomach misery and a 'brain fog' type of feeling. It can also make you feel like you need to lie down before you fall down. You might want to consider exclusion diets or specific food testing panels. Forget the regular blood test panes for food issues. In our setting we've found they typically don't work. Genova puts out a decent food panel test that you might want to check into.
Maybe you have neurocardiogenic syncope? Google it and see if this sounds like you. Talk to your doctor and see what you can find out.
